text: The Party of the Dictatorship of the Proletariat (Partiya Diktaturi Proletariata) is a communist political party in Russia. PDP was founded in 1990. The party is based in the city of Samara and it is led by Grigory Isayev. PDP publishes Zabastovka. ==External links== * Official website * Non- Official website Category:1990 establishments in Russia Category:1990 establishments in the Soviet Union Category:Communist parties in Russia Category:Communist parties in the Soviet Union Category:Political parties established in 1990
title: Party of the Dictatorship of the Proletariat
